attributes.action: dutie of care for children at school over bullying
attributes.additional_details: how many more kids should be bullied and kill them self's regards to the bullies there should removed but all that happens is you send the bullies home for a short time and that's it the person going through it does this in silent end ends up killing them self's this has to stop the schools have a duty of care towards every child at school but does not go that extra mile it look like the school does not have a ruling in place that is working its the same thing the horse has bolted now let us shout the gate .... one more child will kill them self's over bullying this is one too many
